ad_text: L.P. Transportation Sponsored Union Mechanics – $2,000 Sign-On Bonus 13-bay truck and fleet maintenance in Chester, NY. $2,000 Sign-On Bonus $80,000/year, plus: Paid Time Off: 5 sick days 5 personal days Your Birthday – paid! 7 paid holidays 1 week vacation after 1st year 2 weeks vacation after 2 years 3 weeks vacation after 5 years $3,000 Insurance Opt-Out Option Full Union Benefits Medical Prescription Dental Eye/Vision $55/week Family Coverage Free CDL-A Training - $10,000 value $800/year Uniform Service/Boot & Tool Allowance 401(k) Pension Match to 5% Overtime after 8 hours and Saturdays Additional income available for CDL-A holders Get full union benefits with a 100-year-old family company that understands you have responsibilities beyond our facility. We can work with you to meet your military, family, or other obligations. Apply now at https://lptransportationcareers.com/mechanic-union/ . FULL-TIME · $80,000 / YEAR · CHESTER, NEW YORK Class A Union Mechanic Apply now

L.P. Transportation Sponsored CDL-A Drivers and Owner-Operators Needed CDL-A with HazMat and minimum 2 years experience required. Full-time year-round and Full-time seasonal (Nov- April) Earn up to $31/hour Work/Park Near Home REGIONAL ROUTES: Maine, New Hampshire, New Jersey, New York, Connecticut, Pennsylvania, Rhode Island L.P. Transportation has openings for drivers and owner-operators with 1-day routes across the Northeast. You can be home most nights and weekends. (Longer routes available) Drivers earn up to $31.00/hour, plus overtime, Paid holidays, vacations, sick days. 401(k) with Company Match (to 4%/yr) PLUS Company Funded Pension (5%/yr) Total Company Contribution up to 9%/year. Health Benefits (Medical/prescription/dental/eye) with Opt-Out payments. Safety Card and Safety Bonus Programs Assigned Trucks. FULL-TIME · $31 / HOUR Class A CDL Truck Driver Apply now
